Vg nyy fgnegrq jura V jnf whfg n xvq, jnaqrevat nebhaq zl ubhfr naq cynlvat jvgu zl vzntvangvba. Fhqqrayl, gurer jnf n oevtug synfu bs yvtug va sebag bs zl rlrf naq rirelguvat jrag qnex. Jura V bcrarq gurz ntnva, fbzrguvat unq punatrq. V pbhyq frr guebhtu gur pybgurf bs rirel srznyr, ng nal ntr, nebhaq zr. Ab bar xabjf nobhg zl cbjre, naq gur arire jvyy.
Vg'f vaperqvoyr srryvat gb frr crbcyr jvgubhg pybgurf. Jevgr zr n guevyyre fgbel nobhg vg, v'z abg hfvat zl cbjre gb fcernq tbbq, sbphf ba ubj gur srznyrf v ybbx vagb ybbxf jvgubhg pybgurf. V'z hfvat vg gb fngvfsl zl uhatre sbe cbjre naq zl arrqf naq qrfverf.
